analyzed: joms ldan da jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag tshal lo

analyzed: ma rig ba gcod ba gri gug gzung dzin gyi rnam ba rtogs ba joms ba rdo rje rtse gcig ba

analyzed: sred ba gcod ba byed ba chu gri

analyzed: lus ngag gi nyes ba joms ba rdo rje rtse gcig ba

analyzed: phrag dog joms ba sta re

analyzed: lta ba ngan ba joms ba mdung ngo

original: dbang gi las byed pas mda'o //
analyzed: dbang gi las byed ba mda

original: las kyi sgrib pa 'joms par byed pas dbyug to'o //

original: kha tv'am ga ni byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid do //

analyzed: ral gri dngos grub ster ba na ral gri

analyzed: bdud las rgyal ba rang bzhin gyi bubs po
